dict.acceptation: 任何东西；（用于否定句、疑问句中以及 if 或 whether 和 prevent、ban、avoid 等动词后，代替 something）任何东西；重要东西；重要事物；

sent.orig: Words such as "he","it","who", and "anything" are pronouns.
Vivian: And you don't make anything and you don't build anything.
sent.trans: 维维安：你不生产什么东西也不建造什么东西。

sent.orig: Didn't tell you to give him anything, anything at all, to keep him from crying?
sent.trans: 我不是告诉你他要什么就给他什么，可千万别让他哭吗？

sent.orig: There is no rationale for efforts to anything, and there is no rationale reason to anything.
sent.trans: 没有力气去理任何事情，也没有任何理由去理任何事情。

sent.orig: You can write about anything you see and see anything you want.
sent.trans: 你要看什么都可以，看到任何东西部可以写。
